title: Backup and restore
content:
This section provides detailed information on the backup and restore solution for all deployments, including AWS, Azure, GCP, OpenShift and embedded Kubernetes. In this solution, you can back up and restore Kubernetes configurations by using the open-source tool Velero. For the PostgreSQL database and external storage data, you can use cloud native backup/restore services.

The following topics are covered in this section.

  • Overview of backup and restore
  • Use case: back up and restore
  • Set up Velero
  • SMA backup procedures
  • SMA restore procedures
